title: 07/15: David Johnson's Risk/Reward; Gio Underrated? (Recorded Friday) (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Let's put David Johnson (1:40) under a microscope! Our concern is with the ARI offense. Will it hold Johnson back? Is he going too early in drafts? ... Unveiling another draft strategy (9:45) that seems a little boring but very practical. Plus we regulate one commissioner issue (16:00), talk about the lack of love for Devin Funchess (20:00), pros and cons of drafting Randall Cobb (23:30), and why Saquon Barkley in the first round is a little scary (27:50) ... Heath loves Gio Bernard's draft value (30:41). Find out why we don't exactly agree on what Gio's upside is. We also have plenty of your voicemails at 954-689-3199 (39:30) and what was breaking news at the time (52:35): DeMarco Murray is retiring ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
